DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy brodalumab take every two week two different dos participant moderate severe plaque psoriasis . A second purpose study assess safety efficacy brodalumab replace placebo participant compare participant still receive brodalumab .
DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy , Safety , Withdrawal Retreatment With Brodalumab ( AMG 827 ) Moderate Severe Plaque Psoriasis Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subject stable moderate severe plaque psoriasis least 6 month Subject must consider , opinion investigator , suitable candidate treatment biologic per regional labeling Subject involve body surface area ( BSA ) ≥ 10 % , PASI ≥ 12 , sPGA ≥ 3 screen baseline Subject diagnose erythrodermic psoriasis , pustular psoriasis , guttate psoriasis , medicationinduced psoriasis , skin condition ( eg , eczema ) would interfere study evaluation Subject know history Crohn 's disease Subject significant concurrent medical condition laboratory abnormality , define study protocol Subject stop use certain psoriasis therapy define study protocol Subject previously use antiIL17 biologic therapy
